Package org.jlab.smoothness.presentation.filter

Class AuditContext

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.smoothness.presentation.filter.AuditContext
public class AuditContext extends Object
Leverages ThreadLocal to share an audit key-value data store across layers of an application for a given HTTP request. Username and request IP address are stored explicitly (outside the generic key-value store) as they are critical audit data.
